text:
if you click on authoring, the top menu is composed by images
if you click on site or admin, the top menu is pure HTML
creator: eburriel@yahoo.com

text: I can confirm this. Does anyone else experience this problem?
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The reason for this behaviour is the XUL menu declaration which is enabled in
publication sitemaps (for authoring menus), but not in info- and admin-area menus.
